document_data.name: Great Thump
document_data.mainbody: '''''Great thump''''' was a common spell used by [[geisha]]. The spell was sometimes used by [[wu jen]] and was extremely rare outside [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Effects: Similar to ''[[thump]]'', the spell was used by the caster to reprimand an aggressive creature. When cast, an ornamental fan would thump a creature, and the creature lost all interest in attacking the caster. If the creature was attacked, the spell would expire and the creature became aggressive once more.
document_data.Components: The spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]], [[somatic component|somatic]] and [[material component]]s.
